message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $9,000 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to consider a price of $7,500?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see if I can do a bit better. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8,250. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $7,800?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $8,100, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $7,600?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I can do $8,050, but I think that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $7,500?
I'm starting to think we're at an impasse, Bob. I can do one last concession at $8,025, but I really think that's it. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one last concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I think I'll look elsewhere.
